publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2260 Ms Sandra White: Wheelchair Curling Championshipsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of, and participants in, the World Wheelchair Curling Championships which will start on 17 January 2005 at the Braehead Ice Rink and run for six days; welcomes the fact that these championships highlight the great sporting potential of para-Olympians, especially the current wheelchair curling champions, Scotland, who won the title last year; notes that the event will attract 90 competitors from 16 countries worldwide, and wishes the Scottish team the best of luck and success at these forthcoming world championships.
S2M-2260 Wheelchair Curling Championships (lodged on 14 January 2005) Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-2260 Wheelchair Curling Championships (lodged on 14 January 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-2260 Wheelchair Curling Championships (lodged on 14 January 2005) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Tricia Marwick*, Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Fiona Hyslop*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2260 Wheelchair Curling Championships (lodged on 14 January 2005) Elaine Smith*
